name: NORMA
text: Enjoy.

name: COOPER
text: (relishing) Mmm, this must be where pies go when they die. Mmm.TUNE: LAURA PALMER'S THEME

name: COOPER
text: Okay Harry, would you please tell me why you really called me in here.

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: Cooper, your gonna have to go along with me on this. Even if it sounds a little weird.

name: COOPER
text: I'm with you.

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: Twin Peaks is different, a long way from the world. You've noticed that.

name: COOPER
text: Yes I have.

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: That's exactly the way we like it but there's a ... back end to that that's kind of different too. Maybe that's the price we pay for all the good things.

name: COOPER
text: What would that be?

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: There's a sort of evil out there. Something very, very strange in these old woods. Call it what you want. A darkness, a presence. It takes many forms but ... its been out there for as long as anyone can remember and we've always been here to fight it.

name: COOPER
text: We?

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: Men before us, men before them and after we're gone.

name: COOPER
text: A secret society. (wide eyed, great interest)

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: Why don't we take Agent Cooper for a little ride.TUNE ENDS: LAURA PALMER'S THEME

name: COOPER
text: Where to?TUNE: WALKING IN THE DARK   32K

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: The Bookhouse.BIG ED, SHERIFF TRUMAN and HAWK look at each other, raise an index finger to their temple and drag it down. This is a secret sign for the Bookhouse Boys.TUNE ENDS: WALKING IN THE DARK   32KCUT TO:INT. BOOKHOUSE - NIGHTBIG ED, HAWK, SHERIFF TRUMAN and COOPER enter the Bookhouse, a darkly lit log building with a bar on one side of the room. Shelves, floor to ceiling, loaded with books divide the space, opposite the bar, into compartments.

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: This is where we get together. Going on twenty years now.

name: COOPER
text: We meaning?

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: The Bookhouse Boys. The coffee's free.

name: COOPER
text: I like the sound of that.SHERIFF TRUMAN leads COOPER to a compartment where JAMES HURLEY and JOEY PAULSON guard a young man tied up in a chair with a gag over his mouth. The young man is BERNARD RENAULT a younger brother of JACQUES.

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: Cooper, you know James.

name: JAMES
text: Agent Cooper.

name: COOPER
text: James.

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: This is Joey Paulson.

name: COOPER
text: Joey.JOEY nods to COOPER.

name: COOPER
text: Who is this?

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: Bernard Renault, Jacques brother, janitor at the Roadhouse. Bernard came across the border this morning with an ounce of cocaine in his kitbag. I thought we'd ask him a few questions.JOEY removes the gag over BERNARD'S mouth.

name: COOPER
text: Did you ever sell drugs to Laura Palmer?BERNARD speaks with a heavy French-Canadian accent.

name: BERNARD
text: I don't sell drugs.

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: How much does Jacques pay you to be the mule?

name: BERNARD
text: Jacques don't pay me nothing. I'm no mule.

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: So that ounce you had that was for personal use?

name: BERNARD
text: That's right.

name: COOPER
text: I guess you don't get a whole lot of sleep at night then, huh Bernie.

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: Your brother didn't come into work the last few days. Where's he been?

name: BERNARD
text: I don't know. He got personal business.

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: Who else is he dealing with?

name: BERNARD
text: Why don't you ask him yourself? He be back tonight, in a minute.

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: He's coming to work at the Roadhouse?

name: BERNARD
text: He the bartender isn't he.

name: COOPER
text: (leans toward BERNARD) Bernard, we got you tied up in a chair. Your mixed up with your brother in a wide variety of felonies. What I want to know is why in the world would you tell us where and when to find him?CUT TO:EXT. ROAD - NIGHTAlong a road near the Roadhouse, JACQUES RENAULT, a fat man in jeans and a plaid shirt, is walking. As he walks, he stops and looks at ...CUT TO:EXT. ROADHOUSE - NIGHTWe view JACQUES POV of the Roadhouse with its neon sign of a gun and the words bang-bang blinking. On top of the roof a small red light is blinking.CUT TO:EXT. ROAD - NIGHTWe view a CLOSEUP of JACQUES fat face as he stares at the light.CUT TO:EXT. ROADHOUSE - NIGHTWe view a CLOSEUP of a red flashing light on the roof.CUT TO:EXT. ROAD - NIGHTWe view a CLOSEUP of JACQUES fat face as he recognizes the red beacon as a warning. He turns around and runs off into the direction he came from.CUT TO:INT. JOHNSON HOUSE - NIGHTTUNE: THE BOOKHOUSE BOYS (1:12 - 2:11)LEO JOHNSON is working in the kitchen with a knife cutting the bottom of a boot. The phone rings and he answers it while still working.

name: LEO
text: Yeah.

name: JACQUES
text: (over the phone) Leo, ...CUT TO:EXT. CASH N' CARRY - NIGHTAt a payphone on the outside wall of the convenience store, JACQUES speaks, with a slight French-Canadian accent, to LEO.

name: JACQUES
text: ... this Jacques.

name: LEO
text: (over the phone) What's up?

name: JACQUES
text: The light, the bust light's on. Bernard's in trouble.CUT TO:INT. JOHNSON HOUSE - NIGHT

name: LEO
text: Are you sure?

name: JACQUES
text: (over the phone) I saw it man.CUT TO:EXT. CASH N' CARRY - NIGHT

name: JACQUES
text: You got to get me out of here Leo. Border run.CUT TO:INT. JOHNSON HOUSE - NIGHT

name: LEO
text: Where are you?

name: JACQUES
text: (over the phone) Phone booth by the Cash N' Carry.CUT TO:EXT. CASH N' CARRY - NIGHT

name: JACQUES
text: And I don't like waiting man.CUT TO:INT. JOHNSON HOUSE - NIGHT

name: LEO
text: Shut up I'm on my way.SHELLY JOHNSON enters the kitchen through the back door of the house. LEO puts the knife and boot down. He stares at her.

name: SHELLY
text: Hi.LEO grabs a bag and his jacket off the table and heads toward the door past SHELLY.

name: SHELLY
text: Where ya' going?

name: LEO
text: You don't need to know.LEO heads out the door. SHELLY places her purse on the kitchen table. LEO'S Corvette can be heard starting up and take off outside with a squeal from the tires. SHELLY removes a handgun from her purse and walks over to a cabinet. She pries apart a small panel above the doors from the cabinet, lays the gun inside beside the bloody shirt and replaces the panel.TUNE ENDS: THE BOOKHOUSE BOYS (1:12 - 2:11)CUT TO:EXT. BLACK LAKE - NIGHTWe view the lake and the mountains beyond lit by moonlight with the sound of a distant fog horn and crickets. Lights from cabins along the lake shore can also be seen.CUT TO:EXT. BLUE PINE LODGE - NIGHTWe view the front of the lodge. Crickets can be heard.CUT TO:INT. BLUE PINE LODGE - NIGHTIn the living room seated on the couch, SHERIFF TRUMAN stares at JOSIE, who looks down at the ground.

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: Josie, Josie, what's wrong?

name: JOSIE
text: Nothing.

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: Nothing?JOSIE takes a drink from her wine glass. SHERIFF TRUMAN stares longingly at her.

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: God, your beautiful.She turns to him and smiles but returns to looking at the floor, somewhat sad.

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: Josie, there is something wrong. What is it? I want you to tell me.

name: JOSIE
text: Something horrible is going to happen. They want to hurt me. I know it.

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: Who? Who want's to hurt you?TUNE: LOVE THEME FROM TWIN PEAKS

name: JOSIE
text: Catherine, Catherine and Benjamin Horne.

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: What makes you think so?We PAN to a nearby house intercom panel on the wall just above SHERIFF TRUMAN.

name: JOSIE
text: I heard Catherine ...CUT TO:INT. BLUE PINE LODGE - NIGHTIn her bedroom, CATHERINE MARTELL listens in on the conversation from the house intercom.

name: JOSIE
text: ... on the phone saying I'd never suspect. Just like with Andrew's death.

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: Andrew's death was an accident.

name: JOSIE
text: Was it? Catherine keeps the mill account books in her safe. Two books, different numbers.TUNE ENDS: LOVE THEME FROM TWIN PEAKSCUT TO:INT. BLUE PINE LODGE - NIGHTJOSIE and SHERIFF TRUMAN walk into the library. JOSIE shows him where the hidden safe is at behind a swing out section of the book shelves.

name: JOSIE
text: Andrew built this years ago. (using a key she unlocks it) I don't think Catherine knows that I know its here. (turns to look at TRUMAN, opens the door of the safe) Why do you think we have two sets of books?

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: The usual reasons would have something to do with stealing maybe worse.JOSIE looks into the safe and sees only one book, not the two she expects to find. She pulls out the one book and hands it to SHERIFF TRUMAN, who looks it over.

name: JOSIE
text: There were two. I saw them. You believe me don't you.

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: Of course I do. There's nothing unusual in this one.

name: JOSIE
text: There were two.CUT TO:INT. BLUE PINE LODGE - NIGHTIn her room, CATHERINE listens to JOSIE and SHERIFF TRUMAN over the intercom while holding the missing account book.

name: JOSIE
text: (over the speaker) I swear there were two.CATHERINE turns the intercom off and walks over to her desk. She lifts a drop panel that reveals a secret, hidden compartment where she places the corrupt account book. PETE MARTELL walks in and sees her at her desk. PETE tries to back out unnoticed but she sees him. He knows he's been caught but tries to cover it up.

name: PETE
text: Have ... have you seen my tackle box?

name: CATHERINE
text: The next time you and the merry widow want to take a peek in my safe don't go through so much trouble. Be a man about it Pete. Ask me to my face.

name: PETE
text: (stern face) Maybe I'll ... check the truck.PETE backs up out the door and closes it behind him.CUT TO:EXT. GHOSTWOOD MEMORIAL PARK - NIGHTWe view COOPER standing in the graveyard.CUT TO:EXT. GHOSTWOOD MEMORIAL PARK - NIGHTWe view COOPER'S POV of LAURA PALMER'S grave from a distance as DR. JACOBY walks up to it. LAURA'S grave has some flowers in vases. DR. JACOBY, wearing a cape and hat, also brings flowers for her grave. He stands near her grave. COOPER walks up to him. DR. JACOBY, unaware, is spooked by COOPER when he speaks nearby to him.

name: COOPER
text: Dr. Jacoby. I didn't see you at the funeral today.DR. JACOBYI'm a terrible person Agent Cooper. I pretend that I'm not ... but I am. Oh, I sit and listen to their problems day after day. These people ... think of me as their friend. Truth is I really don't care. I thought nothing, no one ... could ever reach me again. Laura changed all that. I couldn't come today. I just couldn't. I hope she understands. (slight cry) I hope she forgives me.CUT TO:TUNE: DARK TIMESEXT. BLUE PINE LODGE - NIGHTIn the living room, JOSIE sits in SHERIFF TRUMAN'S arms with her back to his chest. He leans his face against hers.

name: JOSIE
text: You think its possible? You think somebody killed Andrew?

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: I don't know.

name: JOSIE
text: I believe ... what they want is to take the mill away from me. For Benjamin to have the land. If ... if it was true with Andrew ... you think they'll kill me too.TUNE ENDS: DARK TIMESTUNE: TWIN PEAKS THEME    SHERIFF TRUMAN gently moves JOSIE around so that they are face to face. He cups her face with his hands and says ...

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: Josie. Nothing is going to happen to you not now, not ever, not while I'm around.JOSIE and SHERIFF TRUMAN kiss and kiss with a growing passion. They move to the floor and continue kissing.FADE OUT:FADE IN:EXT. FULL MOON - NIGHTWe view the full moon with a few thin clouds being blown in the sky. Cascading water can be heard from the nearby falls.CUT TO:INT. TIMBER ROOM - NIGHTIn the dining area of the hotel, COOPER and DEPUTY HAWK sit back in their chairs at a table drinking beers. They watch people dancing on the dance floor adjacent to the tables in the dining area.

name: COOPER
text: Do you believe in the soul?

name: HAWK
text: Several.

name: COOPER
text: More then one?CUT TO:INT. TIMBER ROOM - NIGHTOn the dance floor next to the dining area, we view LELAND standing, with his eyes closed, in the middle of the dance floor as couples dance all around him. We hear HAWK and COOPER as we watch LELAND.

name: HAWK
text: Blackfoot legend. Waking souls that give life to the mind and the body. A dream soul that wanders.

name: COOPER
text: Dream souls? Where do they wander?

name: HAWK
text: Faraway places. The land of the dead.

name: COOPER
text: Is that where Laura is?

name: HAWK
text: Laura's in the ground, Agent Cooper. That's the only thing I'm sure of.TUNE ENDS: TWIN PEAKS THEME    TUNE: IN THE MOOD   28KAs a big band tune starts we see LELAND smile and start to dance in place to the music.CUT TO:INT. TIMBER ROOM - NIGHTAt a table in the dining area, we view COOPER and HAWK.

name: COOPER
text: To Laura.HAWK and COOPER touch bottles in remembrance for LAURA.

name: COOPER
text: Godspeed.CUT TO:INT. TIMBER ROOM - NIGHTOn the dance floor, LELAND wanders from COUPLE to COUPLE on the dance floor asking to dance. Each COUPLE he asks turns away, LELAND becomes frustrated and beggingly asks to be danced with.

name: LELAND
text: Will you dance with me. Please.

name: COUPLE I
text: No.

name: LELAND
text: Dance with me, please. (COUPLE shrugs) Dance with me. (denied) Dance with me please, please, please.

name: COUPLE II
text: Leave us alone.

name: LELAND
text: Somebody dance with me. (sobs)COOPER and HAWK see LELAND crying and upsetting people. They both get up and walk over to him.TUNE ENDS: IN THE MOOD   28KWhen they reach him, LELAND is hunched over and crying.

name: COOPER
text: Mr. Palmer?

name: HAWK
text: Leland.LELAND straightens up and puts his hands on the shoulders of COOPER and HAWK.

name: COOPER
text: Lets take you home.

name: LELAND
text: Home. Home. Home.TUNE: LOVE THEME FROM TWIN PEAKSCOOPER and HAWK slowly lead him off the dance floor.CUT TO:EXT. TRAFFIC LIGHT - NIGHTWe view a CLOSEUP of a traffic light signaling red and moving slightly in the breeze.TUNE ENDS: LOVE THEME FROM TWIN PEAKSFADE OUT:CLOSE:FADE IN:TUNE: LAURA PALMER'S THEME    We view LAURA PALMER'S homecoming picture as the end credits roll.TUNE ENDS: LAURA PALMER'S THEME    FADE TO BLACK:

name: LOG LADY
text: Even the ones who laugh are sometimes caught without an answer. These creatures who introduce themselves but we swear we have met them somewhere before. Yes, look in the mirror. What do you see? Is it a dream, or a nightmare? Are we being introduced against our will? Are they mirrors? I can see the smoke. I can smell the fire. The battle is drawing nigh.FADE OUT:INTRO:FADE IN:TUNE: TWIN PEAKS THEME    CREDITS run with the scenes of a bird in a tree, the mill machinery at work, the road into town with the welcome sign, the hotel by the falls and the river.TUNE ENDS: TWIN PEAKS THEME    FADE OUT:FADE IN:TUNE: LAURA PALMER'S THEME    EXT. PALMER HOUSE - DAYWe view the front of the house.CUT TO:INT. PALMER HOUSE - DAYIn the living room, we view a photograph of LAURA PALMER as the homecoming queen. Our view PANS the room to a sketch that DEPUTY ANDY BRENNAN, using a charcoal pencil and a pad of paper, is drawing from a description that SARAH PALMER is giving to him of the frightening man she saw in her vision. SHERIFF HARRY S. TRUMAN sits in a chair opposite them. DONNA HAYWARD sits next to SARAH.

name: SARAH
text: Yeah, yeah. His hair was long, filthy gray on gray, long hair.MADELEINE FERGUSON walks up to SHERIFF TRUMAN with a silver coffee set and offers him some coffee. He grabs a cup of the tray and looks at her. MADELEINE, with her long black hair and thick rim glasses, smiles.

name: SARAH
text: I saw him ... at the foot of Laura's bed. He looked like an animal.

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: Have you ever seen this man before?

name: SARAH
text: No, never. His face, my god, his face. (becomes upset)LELAND PALMER enters the room, wearing a robe, looking like he just woke up.

name: LELAND
text: Sarah, did you tell them about the necklace? (SARAH composes herself) Your gonna love that one.

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: What necklace?

name: LELAND
text: (holds up two fingers) She's had two visions. (walks off)

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: Go ahead Sarah.

name: SARAH
text: Leland? (walks after him) Leland?SARAH stops roughly where he was standing.

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: Sarah.She turns to SHERIFF TRUMAN and tells her earlier vision.

name: SARAH
text: Its night. A flashlight beam moves across the ground. A hand, a gloved hand, lifts a rock and takes out a necklace, broken in half. It was Laura's.DONNA listens and appears disturbed from the realization of SARAH'S vision.TUNE ENDS: LAURA PALMER'S THEME    CUT TO:TUNE: INVITATION TO LOVE   28K

name: TELEVISION
text: We view a CLOSEUP on the television and see the end of the intro for the television program 'Invitation to Love' as its tune swells down over a blue background with a note shown with a scarlet red flowing script that writes out the program's title on virgin white paper.

name: ANNOUNCER
text: ... invitation to love.TUNE ENDS: INVITATION TO LOVE   28KThe INTRO for the show FADES OUT. The show FADES IN to a nerdy looking man, CHET, with thin greasy hair and glasses, and to EMERALD, a woman with long hair and wearing a lot of costume jewelry. CHET is seated and EMERALD stands beside him running her fingers though his hair.

name: EMERALD
text: Don't fight it Chet. You know as well as I there's still something between us. (looks at her greasy hand) There always will be.

name: CHET
text: For god sake Emerald. That may be true but I'm married to your sister now. It's wrong.

name: EMERALD
text: Well, you always said you could never tell us apart so ...CUT TO:INT. TWIN PEAKS SHERIFF'S DEPARTMENT - DAYIn the reception office, we see that it is LUCY MORAN, chewing on a pencil top, is watching the program very closely. SHERIFF TRUMAN and DEPUTY ANDY enter the building and walk up to the reception window.

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: Morning Lucy. What's going on?

name: LUCY
text: Uhh thanks to Jade, Jared decided not to kill himself and he's changed his will, leaving the Towers to Jade instead of Emerald but Emerald found out about it and now she's trying to (TRUMAN and ANDY look at each other in befuddlement) seduce Chet to give her the new will so she can destroy it. Montana's planning to kill Jared at midnight so the Towers will belong to Emerald and Montana but I think she's going to double cross him and he doesn't know it yet. Poor Chet.

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: What's going on ... here?

name: LUCY
text: Uh, Agent Cooper is in the conference room with Dr. Jacoby.

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: Thank you.SHERIFF TRUMAN walks off toward the conference room. ANDY moves closer to the reception window.

name: ANDY
text: (softly) Lucy, why couldn't I spend the night last night?

name: LUCY
text: Will you be having coffee Deputy Brennan?ANDY shies away from LUCY'S cold reply.CUT TO:INT. TWIN PEAKS SHERIFF'S DEPARTMENT - DAYIn the conference room, DR. LAWRENCE JACOBY sits at the long end of the table with the blackboard, with a map of Tibet, in the background. He wears a pair of glasses with one red lens and one blue lens. AGENT COOPER sits at the other end of the table sternly watching DR. JACOBY perform a magic trick. The magic trick has two white balls between the fingers on one hand. He taps that hand against his head and one ball disappears. He opens his mouth to reveal the ball. DR. JACOBY performs the trick twice before COOPER asks ...

name: COOPER
text: Was Laura Palmer seeing you because she was addicted to cocaine?DR. JACOBYAgent Cooper, I'd like to help ya' but uh ... got a little problem here, uh. Look may-maybe there's some sort of hula we can do around my doctor / patient confidentiality, huh.

name: COOPER
text: It is safe to say she came to you because she was having problems?DR. JACOBYOh my yes.

name: COOPER
text: Were her problems of a sexual nature?DR. JACOBYAgent Cooper, the problems of our entire society are of a sexual nature.DR. JACOBY stands up, walks over to the blackboard with the map of Tibet and looks it over.DR. JACOBYTibet. (smiles) You know, my abiding interests lie to the East as well but only as far as Ha-vai-i (Hawaii). The ancient Hawaiians often turn to the soothing rhizome of the ginger plant to ease the pain of profound confusion. Which, more often then not, was sexual.

name: COOPER
text: Ginger is nonaddictive, cocaine is.DR. JACOBYLook the-the fact that-that Laura Palmer sought medication, no matter how dubious, was actually a positive sign.

name: COOPER
text: Dr. Jacoby, I understand you cared deeply for Laura Palmer. Why is it that you won't help us?DR. JACOBY moves toward COOPER.DR. JACOBYMy ... own ... personal investigation, I suspect, will be ongoing for the rest of my life.SHERIFF TRUMAN enters the room. Now close to COOPER, DR. JACOBY bends slightly to him and says ...DR. JACOBYLaura ... had ... secrets ... and around those secrets she built the fortress ... that, well that in my six months with her, I was not able to penetrate and for which I consider myself ... an abject failure.

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: Doctor, did Laura ever discuss Bobby Briggs or James Hurley with you?DR. JACOBYNow they were boys, Laura was a woman.

name: COOPER
text: She had sex with three men the night she was murdered. Were you one of them?DR. JACOBY looks as if he is going to proudly say yes but sighs and says ...DR. JACOBYNo.

name: COOPER
text: Who killed her Dr. Jacoby?DR. JACOBYThe night after Laura died, I followed a man that uh ... Laura had spoken to me about. He was driving a red corvette. I followed him to the old sawmill road and then I lost him. And that gentlemen is all I can tell you.The intercom unit buzzes. LUCY'S voice can be heard over the speaker.

name: LUCY
text: Agent Cooper, there's a Gordon Cole on the phone. He say's your expecting his call. Should I put him through?

name: COOPER
text: Yes Lucy, put him through. Thank you doctor that will be all.DR. JACOBY heads out but is stopped at the door by a question.

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: You'll be in town doctor?DR. JACOBYWell, I'm planning a pilgrimage to Pebble Beach ... but that's not till the end of the month. Hang loose howies.DR. JACOBY gives a hang loose hand sign and leaves the room.

name: COOPER
text: Does Leo Johnson drive a red corvette?COOPER moves to a small table along the wall, picks up the intercom unit and places it on the table.

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: Yes.

name: COOPER
text: How we doing on Jacques Renault?

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: There's an APB on him. His brother made bail this morning. I got an all points on him too.COOPER composes himself before turning the intercom unit on. The man speaking over the intercom is GORDON COLE, COOPER'S superior.

name: COOPER
text: Harry this is my supervisor. (presses the button on intercom unit) Good morning Gordon. How we doin'?

name: GORDON
text: (over the speaker) Cooper, where do we start? The Palmer girl or Albert's new best friend, Harry Truman.SHERIFF TRUMAN, a little worried, walks over to the window.

name: COOPER
text: Laura Palmer.

name: GORDON
text: Albert has been very busy. The twine he found in her upper arm is a common household variety, Finley's Fine Twine.

name: COOPER
text: And the twine on her wrists?

name: GORDON
text: Definitely not a match. No ID yet and those marks on her shoulders, bird bites.

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: Bird bites?

name: GORDON
text: He'll also be faxing a reconstruction of the plastic fragment from her stomach.

name: COOPER
text: Great, tell Albert we're anxiously waiting his results.

name: GORDON
text: Now for the bad news Coop. I got an OJ and a AFO here from Albert concerning his mano y mano with the local Sheriff Truman. Albert wants this guy's badge Coop.A little agitated, COOPER stands up and becomes rather animated as he talks.

name: COOPER
text: Gordon, here's how it is. You know Albert. In my opinion Sheriff Truman displayed the patience of a saint 'not' clocking him a day earlier then he did.

name: GORDON
text: He wants it filed with the US Attorney.

name: COOPER
text: File it under 'F' for forget it.

name: GORDON
text: Cooper?

name: COOPER
text: And you tell Albert that if he wants to pursue this I'll fight him all the way up the chain to Washington.DEPUTY ANDY walks into the room.

name: GORDON
text: Cooper? Coop, don't get excited and hang up on me now.

name: COOPER
text: Talk to you later Gordon.COOPER presses the button on intercom unit to hang up.

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: Thanks. I didn't ... get a whole lot of sleep last night.

name: COOPER
text: Harry, the last thing I want you to worry about, while I'm here, is some city slicker I brought into your town relieving himself upstream.ANDY hands COOPER the drawing he produces using SARAH'S description from her vision.

name: COOPER
text: This is the man I saw in my dream.

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: You saw this man?

name: COOPER
text: I had an intuition that my dream and Sarah Palmer's vision were connected. I didn't go with you this morning because I didn't want to influence her. I'm a strong sender. (to ANDY) The eyes were a bit closer together.The intercom buzzes and LUCY can be heard from the speaker.

name: LUCY
text: Deputy Hawk calling in for Agent Cooper.COOPER picks up a nearby phone.

name: COOPER
text: Hawk. (reply over the phone) Right. Stay there. Follow him if he moves.COOPER hangs up the phone and turns to SHERIFF TRUMAN and ANDY.

name: COOPER
text: Traveling East on highway 12, how long will it take us to reach the Timber Falls Motel?SHERIFF TRUMAN and ANDY answer simultaneously.

name: ANDY
text: Half in hour.

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: Ten minutes.

name: ANDY
text: Depends how you go.

name: COOPER
text: Hawk's found our one-armed man.CUT TO:EXT. TIMBER FALLS MOTEL - DAYTUNE: FRESHLY SQUEEZED (0:26 - 3:48) (UP TEMPO VARIANT)   28KWe view the front of the motel. A maid is pushing a cart near the rooms. A woodpecker can be heard in the background.CUT TO:EXT. TIMBER FALLS MOTEL - DAYIn a parked car in the parking lot of the motel, JOSIE takes photographs. A woodpecker can be heard in the background.CUT TO:INT. TIMBER FALLS MOTEL - DAYIn one of the motel rooms, we view a CLOSEUP of CATHERINE MARTELL, in a robe. We PAN down to see that she is rubbing the back of BENJAMIN HORNE, who is laying face down bare back on a bed. In the background, the television program 'Invitation to Love' can be heard.

name: CATHERINE
text: I wished I could have seen Josie's face, opening the safe for her lawman Romeo. To show him the double set of books ...TUNE ENDS: FRESHLY SQUEEZED (0:26 - 3:48) (UP TEMPO VARIANT)   28K

name: CATHERINE
text: ... and all she finds is the one I've been slowing cooking.

name: BENJAMIN
text: Where's the book that spells bankruptcy.

name: CATHERINE
text: Uhm, I have more then one hiding place. My desk upstairs.

name: MONTANA
text: (from the television) God forgive me.

name: EMERALD
text: (from the television) Oh darling don't be so ...

name: CATHERINE
text: There's a drop panel on the top drawer. Not even Pete the poodle knows about that one. I'm famished.CATHERINE and BENJAMIN take a sip of wine. We can hear the television program.

name: MONTANA
text: (from the television) Let's get one thing straight I didn't spend the evening busting up the Amazons by dodging blow darts ...

name: CATHERINE
text: I suppose room service is too much to expect of this rusticated mildew farm.

name: BENJAMIN
text: You would prefer the lumber baron's suite at the Great Northern.

name: CATHERINE
text: I'd prefer getting on with setting the torch to that damn mill.CUT TO:EXT. TIMBER FALLS MOTEL - DAYSHERIFF TRUMAN and COOPER drive up in TRUMAN'S police cruiser. DEPUTY TOMMY 'THE HAWK' HILL comes up to them as they drive up. A woodpecker can be heard in the background. As SHERIFF TRUMAN steps out, HAWK points and says ...

name: HAWK
text: Harry, he's here at the motel. Room 101, last name is Gerard.CUT TO:INT. TIMBER FALLS MOTEL ROOM - DAYBENJAMIN and CATHERINE lie at the foot of the bed.

name: BENJAMIN
text: Now when the mill goes up in smoke. The headline that we're after is Josie Packard torches bankrupt mill in insurance fraud. Not giant wienie roast in the woods.CATHERINE laughs. He nudges her on.

name: BENJAMIN
text: Hmm, hmm.CUT TO:EXT. TIMBER FALLS MOTEL - DAYSHERIFF TRUMAN, with his gun drawn, walks up towards the motel room door where the ONE-ARMED MAN, PHILLIP MICHAEL GERARD, is staying. As he walks, he passes a timber truck rig full of large tree logs. AGENT COOPER and DEPUTY ANDY are right behind him. ANDY has his hand on his gun, still in its holster. COOPER draws his gun and stands behind ANDY. SHERIFF TRUMAN knocks on the door.

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: Mr. Gerard, its the police, open up.ANDY fumbles with his gun to pull it out of the holster and drops it. The revolver discharges when it hits the ground. SHERIFF TRUMAN and COOPER jump. COOPER is furious for the loss of control in a serious situation. He spins around and shouts.

name: COOPER
text: Geez!SHERIFF TRUMAN ducks down, picks up the gun and hands it to ANDY.CUT TO:INT. TIMBER FALLS MOTEL ROOM - DAYBENJAMIN gets out of bed and moves to the window to see what has happened outside. CATHERINE calmly lays back on the bed.

name: CATHERINE
text: Gun play. Sounds serious.BENJAMIN turns to her with a look of seriousness.CUT TO:EXT. TIMBER FALLS MOTEL - DAYSHERIFF TRUMAN, AGENT COOPER and DEPUTY ANDY are still standing outside the door of the ONE-ARMED MAN, MR. GERARD. They all have their guns drawn and directed toward the door.

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: Mr. Gerard?SHERIFF TRUMAN kicks the door in.CUT TO:INT. TIMBER FALLS MOTEL ROOM - DAYSHERIFF TRUMAN and COOPER rush in to the room and find MR. GERARD at the closet drawer wearing only boxer shorts.

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: Don't move!ONE-ARMED MANOh my god!

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: Put your hands where I can see them.Slowly MR. GERARD moves away from the closet drawer to reveal a missing left arm that was concealed behind the closet door. He stands with his right arm raised. SHERIFF TRUMAN and COOPER lower their guns and look at each other.CUT TO:INT. TIMBER FALLS MOTEL ROOM - DAYBENJAMIN moves away from the window holding a small figure. CATHERINE is still in bed.

name: BENJAMIN
text: You uh ... let me know if there's any blood shed.We see what BENJAMIN is holding a small doll with the likeness of Elvis. He picks up his folded clothes off the bed. Unknowingly something falls out of the pocket of his pants to the floor. CATHERINE notices it. BENJAMIN wiggles the doll in his hand at her and says ...

name: BENJAMIN
text: I'm going to give little Elvis ... a bath.He puts the doll in his robe pocket and walks to the bathroom.TUNE: THE BOOKHOUSE BOYS (2:12 - 2:31) (DRAMATIC VARIANT)   32KCATHERINE gets up to pick up the item and sees that it is a poker chip. A thousand dollar poker chip from One-Eyed Jacks.TUNE ENDS: THE BOOKHOUSE BOYS (2:12 - 2:31) (DRAMATIC VARIANT)   32KCUT TO:TUNE: LAURA PALMER'S THEME    INT. TIMBER FALLS MOTEL ROOM - DAYSHERIFF TRUMAN and COOPER stand next to a seated ONE-ARMED MAN, MR. GERARD, who is looking at the drawing of the man from SARAH'S vision.

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: What do mean you don't know him? You know this man.ONE-ARMED MANNo sir. I've never seen that man before in my life ...TUNE ENDS: LAURA PALMER'S THEME    ONE-ARMED MAN... but you know something he ... he kinda looks like somebody. Doesn't he?

name: COOPER
text: Mr. Gerard, do you have a friend named Bob?ONE-ARMED MANOh, Bob Lydecker is just about my best friend in the world.

name: COOPER
text: Why have you been at the hospital the past two days?ONE-ARMED MANBob's in a coma.

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: There was a Lydecker assaulted three days ago outside a bar. In Lowtown.ONE-ARMED MANThat's Bob. (nods)

name: COOPER
text: Is your friend Bob a doctor?ONE-ARMED MANHe's just about the best dern veterinarian in these parts?HAWK is on the phone near a bedside stand.

name: HAWK
text: Thanks. (hangs up) He's clean, no record, no warrants.HAWK tosses MR. GERARD'S wallet to SHERIFF TRUMAN, who hands it to COOPER. COOPER scans it over before handing it to MR. GERARD. SHERIFF TRUMAN gives HAWK an order.

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: Take a look at his car.We watch DEPUTY ANDY nervously move and peer at a closed suitcase standing atop a table.

name: COOPER
text: Your middle name is Michael?ONE-ARMED MANNamed after my uncle.

name: COOPER
text: How'd you lose the arm?ONE-ARMED MANCar accident. I was on the road from Memphis to ... uh ... someplace. Selling pharmaceuticals. (waxing enthusiasm) Pretty good job.A commotion of rumbling comes from the side of the room. We view ANDY slightly embarrassed as he fumbled in opening the suitcase causing its contents of shoes to spill out onto the table and the floor.ONE-ARMED MANThat's what I'm selling these days. Everybody needs shoes.

name: ANDY
text: There all for the right foot.ONE-ARMED MANIts my sample case. (picks up a shoe) Yeah, two day delivery, guaranteed. Oh and we could certainly take care of all your departmental needs.

name: COOPER
text: The arm you lost, did it have a tattoo?ONE-ARMED MANWhat's this all about? I'm a shoe salesman.

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: Settle down Mr. Gerard. He just asked you a question.

name: COOPER
text: If you won't tell us, we can find out. What did it say?ONE-ARMED MAN(moved to tears) It said ... Mom. (cries)CUT TO:EXT. TIMBER FALLS MOTEL - DAYIn the parking lot, SHERIFF TRUMAN, COOPER and ANDY walk over to their cars. DEPUTY HAWK, kneeling near a puddle of oil, calls SHERIFF TRUMAN over. In the background a woodpecker can be heard.

name: HAWK
text: Harry.

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: (walks over to him) What ya' got?

name: HAWK
text: Car was already staked out when I got here. It was Josie Packard.CUT TO:TUNE: FRESHLY SQUEEZEDEXT. TWIN PEAKS HIGH SCHOOL - DAYWe view the front of the school and its sign.CUT TO:INT. TWIN PEAKS HIGH SCHOOL - DAYIn a girl's bathroom, DONNA applies lipstick as AUDREY walks in and lights up a cigarette. The bathroom has one wall lined with mirrors and sinks. The other side of the room is lined with toilet stalls. The walls and doors of the bathroom are decorated with two red lines that wrap around the room and form two peaks at intervals.

name: AUDREY
text: I've been doing some research. In real life there is no algebra.

name: DONNA
text: Maybe you should run away and join the circus.

name: AUDREY
text: Escape. I got a better idea. A tall, dark and handsome stranger falls madly in love with me. Takes me away to a life of mystery and international intrigue

name: DONNA
text: You mean the FBI agent? Dream on.

name: AUDREY
text: Maybe ... or maybe he'll realize that I'm the woman of his dreams because I'm going to help him figure out who killed Laura.

name: DONNA
text: Is that so.

name: AUDREY
text: Yeah ...TUNE ENDS: FRESHLY SQUEEZED

name: AUDREY
text: ... and your gonna help me. Fact; Laura was seeing James Hurley behind Bobby's back.DONNA is now combing her hair.

name: DONNA
text: What if she was.

name: AUDREY
text: So it is true. Fact; Laura had a sweet tooth for nose candy.

name: DONNA
text: Well I guess that's not such a big secret.

name: AUDREY
text: I didn't know Laura half as well as you and I knew the score, Laura was wild. Come on will you help me?

name: DONNA
text: What else have you figured out Sherlock?

name: AUDREY
text: The morning of the funeral, Dr. Jacoby is talking to my brother Johnny, trying to get him to go to the funeral. So he tells Johnny that Laura's in a better place now blah-blah-blah and he knows that because ... Laura was his patient.

name: DONNA
text: Laura was seeing Jacoby?

name: AUDREY
text: It gets better. You ever heard of One-Eyed Jacks?

name: DONNA
text: Isn't that that western with Marlon Brando?

name: AUDREY
text: Its a place across the border. They have girls working there.

name: DONNA
text: Are you saying you think Laura was one of them?

name: AUDREY
text: I don't know but if its true wouldn't you want to know about it.

name: DONNA
text: Well, it sure'd explain a few things.

name: AUDREY
text: You know I think about it ... I think about Laura being in a place like that and I get all shivery ... but its like a hot cold. Like when ... you hold an ice cube on your bare skin for a long time.

name: DONNA
text: Audrey, I'll help you but whatever we find out we have to promise to keep it between ourselves. Our secret.

name: AUDREY
text: Its a deal ... and I know exactly where to start. (school bell rings) Did you know that Ronette and Laura worked in the same place?

name: DONNA
text: No.

name: AUDREY
text: The perfume counter of my father's department store.TUNE: HAPPY THOUGHTS   18KAs she walks off, AUDREY throws her cigarette into a sink. DONNA watches her leave, walks up to the sink with the cigarette and turns on the water to douse it out.TUNE ENDS: HAPPY THOUGHTS   18KCUT TO:EXT. STATE PRISON - DAYWe view a tall chain link and barbed wire fence of the prison.CUT TO:INT. STATE PRISON - DAYIn a hallway near parole hearing rooms, WILSON MOONIE, a parole officer, exits the hearing room and talks to NORMA JENNINGS, who is standing in the hall.

name: MOONIE
text: I've arranged for you to have a little chat with Hank before your hearing. He's glad your here. I hope I didn't come on too strong yesterday.

name: NORMA
text: I'll be sure to tell him how helpful you've been, Mr. Moonie.CUT TO:TUNE: HANK'S THEME   39KINT. STATE PRISON - DAYEscorted by a guard from a separate room, HANK JENNINGS, wearing prison garb, walks over to NORMA.

name: HANK
text: Haven't seen you for a while Norma.

name: NORMA
text: Been kinda of busy.

name: HANK
text: So, business is good?

name: NORMA
text: Yeah.HANK leans to her slightly.

name: HANK
text: You've got to back me up in there Norma, please. I got to get out. There starting to put the zap on me big time. I know I have no right to ask of you and you have no reason to believe but ... I'll change. I swear on my life, I have changed. Give me a chance to prove it to you.TUNE ENDS: HANK'S THEME   39KCUT TO:INT. STATE PRISON - DAYIn a parole hearing room, we view a guard standing next to an American flag. Our view PANS to three parole judges sitting at one end of the room. HANK, in handcuffs, and WILSON MOONIE sit at a table positioned in the middle of the room. Behind them, to the back wall of the room, sits NORMA.

name: HANK
text: I've replayed it in my mind a million times and I just don't have any answers. A car, in perfect condition, goes out of control. A vagrant, nobody knows, is killed ... while sleeping by the roadside. Why? Why did fate deal me this hand?PAROLE JUDGE #1You were not incarcerated for an act of fate Mr. Jennings.

name: HANK
text: I accept that ... but it was fate. Maybe, in an odd way, even luck that sent me to prison. Just as much as the car accident.PAROLE JUDGE #2What is your point?

name: HANK
text: I know I have a lot to make up for. For the life I destroyed and for another life ... (turns to NORMA) I very nearly destroyed.PAROLE JUDGE #2Mrs. Jennings, your husband would be facing a difficult reentry. How would you help him?

name: NORMA
text: I own the Double R Diner in Twin Peaks. I can give him a job. The boss is tough but fair.PAROLE JUDGE #2And you would live together as man and wife?

name: NORMA
text: Well he is my husband, isn't he?PAROLE JUDGE #1Well we have what we need here. We'll make our decision without the inmate present.TUNE: HANK'S THEME   39KPAROLE JUDGE #2Well let you know by five o'clock today.CUT TO:INT. STATE PRISON - DAYWe view a CLOSEUP of a double three domino in HANK'S cuffed hands. Our view PANS up to see his shifty eyes.CUT TO:INT. STATE PRISON - DAYThe PAROLE JUDGES all leave together. HANK is escorted by a guard out of the room. HANK speaks to NORMA as he passes her on the way out.TUNE ENDS: HANK'S THEME   39K

name: HANK
text: Catch you later.CUT TO:EXT. ONE STOP STORE - DAYWe see two old gas pumps labeled 'Indian Head' as SHERIFF TRUMAN and COOPER drive up in TRUMAN'S police cruiser and park along side them. Before they exit the vehicle, COOPER peers outside the window above the store and says ...

name: COOPER
text: In my dream, Mike said he and Bob lived above a convenience store.

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: Cooper, I'd think you'd be afraid to go to sleep at night.They both exit the vehicle and walk to the building next to the convenience store. In the background, HAWK gives a high five to a FRIEND.

name: FRIEND
text: Hey Hawk.COOPER stops as ANDY walks up to him. SHERIFF TRUMAN walks on up the steps of the entrance and looks at the pet a small girl holds, who is sitting on the steps.

name: COOPER
text: Andy, could you go into the One Stop and get me some twine.

name: ANDY
text: Okay.ANDY walks off. COOPER walks to the building next door, a veterinarian clinic. The log building has a sign above it, 'Aid to the Beast Incarnate'. COOPER and SHERIFF TRUMAN climb the stairs to the entrance and walk in.CUT TO:INT. LYDECKER VETERINARY CLINIC - DAYInside the building we see several people with different animals, including a llama, waiting to be served.CUT TO:INT. LYDECKER VETERINARY CLINIC - DAYAt the reception window, COOPER talks to the RECEPTIONIST and shows her the sketch of the frighting man from SARAH'S vision..

name: RECEPTIONIST
text: No, that's not Dr. Lydecker.

name: COOPER
text: Does Dr. Lydecker treat birds?

name: RECEPTIONIST
text: Why yes, of course.SHERIFF TRUMAN pulls COOPER away from the window to speak to him.

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: You know there are plenty other vets in Twin Peaks.

name: COOPER
text: Yes, but only one has a best friend with one arm. Harry ...A llama disrupts AGENT COOPER as he speaks with SHERIFF TRUMAN by walking between them and even nearly touching his face with its face. The llama snorts as it walks by.

name: COOPER
text: ... in the heat of the investigative pursuit the shortest distance between two points is not necessarily a straight line.ANDY walks up to COOPER and SHERIFF TRUMAN.

name: COOPER
text: Andy, hand me that spool of Finley's Fine Twine.COOPER briefly scans it and then hands it to SHERIFF TRUMAN. SHERIFF TRUMAN studies it and looks at ANDY as COOPER walks off to the reception window.

name: COOPER
text: Mrs. Lumer, where going to have to confiscate your files.

name: RECEPTIONIST
text: What?COOPER returns to SHERIFF TRUMAN.

name: COOPER
text: Harry, as clear as the signs on the turnpike, the bird that attacked Laura Palmer is a client of this office.FADE OUT:FADE IN:EXT. JOHNSON HOUSE - DAYWe view the front of the house with the sounds of ducks from the nearby lake.CUT TO:TUNE: FRESHLY SQUEEZED (0:26 - 3:48)INT. JOHNSON HOUSE - DAYIn the kitchen, we view BOBBY BRIGGS seated on a chair. SHELLY JOHNSON, in her waitress uniform, is sitting on his lap. They are seductively kissing each other.

name: SHELLY
text: Oh, I feel so bad for you. I was watching you at the funeral. My heart was aching. I wanted to hold you so much. (kiss)

name: BOBBY
text: That James Hurley. He was seeing Laura behind my back. I'm gonna fix him.

name: SHELLY
text: Fix me first. (kiss)

name: BOBBY
text: When is Leo due back?

name: SHELLY
text: Don't worry bad boy. I can hear his 'vet a mile away.

name: BOBBY
text: Don't mess around with this Shelly. Where is he?

name: SHELLY
text: He's with his friend. That creepy Jacques.She continues to kiss. BOBBY'S mind is elsewhere as he thinks about what she just said.

name: BOBBY
text: Jacques ... who?

name: SHELLY
text: That Canuk guy that works at the Roadhouse.

name: BOBBY
text: Leo and Jacques?

name: SHELLY
text: What's the matter?BOBBY gets up from chair, lifting SHELLY. She is a little confused by his actions.

name: BOBBY
text: Gotta think ... I gotta think.

name: SHELLY
text: Uhm well ... think later Bobby. I have to get back to the diner in half in hour.

name: BOBBY
text: I gotta tell you something.

name: SHELLY
text: What? What is it?

name: BOBBY
text: I've been on to this for a while and I've been checking it out. Its pretty bad.

name: SHELLY
text: Tell me.

name: BOBBY
text: Leo and Jacques are running drugs across the border, cocaine. And-and the-they've been selling them at school.

name: SHELLY
text: I knew it. I knew Leo was messed up in something.

name: BOBBY
text: I think its even possible they were giving drugs to Laura.

name: SHELLY
text: Bobby, I have to show you something.She walks over to a cabinet, pries off a panel and takes out the bloody shirt that she had stashed there.

name: SHELLY
text: This was in Leo's truck two days after Laura was murdered.

name: BOBBY
text: Are you sure this is Leo's?She fiddles with the shirt trying to find the collar and reveals 'LJ'.

name: SHELLY
text: It has his initials sewn in the collar. He makes me sew them into everything.

name: BOBBY
text: Shelly, ... this ... this could be the answer to our prayers.

name: SHELLY
text: What do you mean?

name: BOBBY
text: You don't need to know. I'm going to take this, okay. You never saw this. Say it. I never saw it.

name: SHELLY
text: I never saw it.

name: BOBBY
text: Leo's not going to be a problem for us anymore. Just stay clear of him, keep quiet.She moves back to the cabinet, reaches into the stash compartment and pulls out a gun.

name: SHELLY
text: I bought this.

name: BOBBY
text: Do you know how to use it?SHELLY opens the top of her waitress uniform, revealing some lingerie, and holds the gun to her chest.

name: SHELLY
text: I thought you could teach me. Teach me Bobby.BOBBY lustily stares at her, spits his gum out to the floor and moves to her.TUNE ENDS: FRESHLY SQUEEZED (0:26 - 3:48)CUT TO:INT. TWIN PEAKS SHERIFF'S DEPARTMENT - DAYWe view AGENT COOPER, SHERIFF TRUMAN, DEPUTY HAWK and DEPUTY ANDY enter the building. COOPER, HAWK and ANDY are carrying boxes of files from the veterinarian clinic.

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: Fellas, take'em right into the conference room.SHERIFF TRUMAN moves to the reception window to speak to LUCY.

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: Lucy, I need you to go through these files and pull out all people who own birds.

name: LUCY
text: How will I know they own birds?

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: It will say so on the cards.

name: LUCY
text: Okay, I'll start going through files then.CUT TO:INT. TWIN PEAKS SHERIFF'S DEPARTMENT - DAYIn the conference room, we watch HAWK, ANDY and COOPER place the boxes of files, marked 'Lydecker Clinic', on and around the conference table. ANDY speaks to COOPER.

name: ANDY
text: Agent Cooper I'm so sorry I don't know what happened. My gun just slipped out of my hand.

name: COOPER
text: Well Andy, have you every used your weapon in the line of duty?

name: ANDY
text: No sir, I haven't. I can't explain what happened. I've been feeling a little high strung.

name: COOPER
text: Well, it was lack of preparation. We'll take care of that.SHERIFF TRUMAN pokes his head through the open door of the conference room.

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: Andy, get some ammunition from the lock box. Meet us downstairs at the pistol range.COOPER pats ANDY'S shoulder before he and SHERIFF TRUMAN walk off.CUT TO:INT. TWIN PEAKS SHERIFF'S DEPARTMENT - DAYIn the hallway, COOPER and SHERIFF TRUMAN pass LUCY, who is carrying a plant watering pitcher. ANDY enters the hall and moves over to LUCY.

name: ANDY
text: Lucy, did you hear what happened? I feel so dumb. I dropped my gun and it went off.

name: LUCY
text: Are you all right?

name: ANDY
text: Oh yeah, I guess so but ...

name: LUCY
text: I would like to chat but I am now under orders to examine these files. So if you excuse me please.LUCY walks off. ANDY is again bothered by LUCY'S cold reply.CUT TO:INT. TWIN PEAKS SHERIFF'S DEPARTMENT - DAYIn the pistol range, we watch COOPER, SHERIFF TRUMAN and DEPUTY HAWK enter and pass Christmas decorations stored at the sides of the entrance to the room. COOPER is loading his gun as he speaks.

name: COOPER
text: Laura Palmer's murder was vicious and calculated. There's no telling what we'll encounter bringing a suspect to ground. After Andy's mishap at the motel. I want to make absolutely certain each of us is comfortable and confident with our firearms.HAWK notices COOPER'S gun before he puts it back in its holster.

name: HAWK
text: Nice piece.

name: COOPER
text: Actually its standard issue. I made a few modifications. (privately to TRUMAN) How long has Lucy been upset with Andy?

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: (points at COOPER) Body language?

name: COOPER
text: In this case it was yelling through a megaphone.ANDY walks in.

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: Six rounds a piece to start with Andy.

name: ANDY
text: Okay.

name: COOPER
text: Care to tell us about you and Lucy, Andy?

name: ANDY
text: Geez, you can tell?

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: Not to many secrets left around here.

name: ANDY
text: She won't speak to me and I don't know why ... and I don't know why she doing what she's doing. I just can't figure her out.

name: COOPER
text: Well there's no logic at work here Andy. Let that one go. In the grand design women were drawn from a different set of blueprints.

name: HAWK
text: Amen to that.HAWK puts on his ear protection cover.

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: Amen. Hawk, Andy.The rest also put on their ear protection cover.

name: COOPER
text: Rapid fire.HAWK confidently and quickly fires his gun at the practice target down the gunnery range. ANDY has a hard time just holding on to the gun as he quickly fires. When their finished, the target sheets are retrieved from the distant shooting area by a motorized line. They all remove their ear protectors and rest them on their shoulders around their neck. HAWK collects the target sheets and hands them to COOPER. COOPER checks over the target sheets to see how they scored.

name: COOPER
text: Hawk, six for six. Two kills, high marks. Andy. (ANDY'S target sheet has no holes) Andy what we need is practice and lots of it. One hour, three times a week. Harry you'll supply the ordinance.

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: Whatever it takes.HAWK and ANDY walk to opposite sides of the room.

name: COOPER
text: Chin up Andy. (nods his head up)

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: You ever been married Cooper?SHERIFF TRUMAN pulls out his gun and checks it.TUNE: LAURA PALMER'S THEME (ONE INSTRUMENT V2)

name: COOPER
text: No. I knew someone ... once who helped me understand commitment, responsibilities and the risks. (pulls out his gun and puts on his ear protection) Who taught me the pain of a broken heart.Confidently and without blinking COOPER quickly discharges his gun at the target. SHERIFF TRUMAN also confidently fires. After firing, the target sheets are retrieved. They remove their ear protection and retrieve their target sheets. Before they look them over HAWK says ...

name: HAWK
text: One woman can make you fly like an eagle another can give you the strength of a lion but only one in the cycle of life can fill your heart with wonder and the wisdom that you have known a singular joy. I wrote that for my girlfriend.

name: COOPER
text: Local gal?

name: HAWK
text: Diane Shapiro, Ph.D. BrandiceCOOPER, impressed, whistles. He returns his attention to the target sheets.

name: COOPER
text: Harry, one miss five hits. Three kills, excellent.SHERIFF TRUMAN silently looks over COOPER target sheet and then hands it to HAWK.

name: HAWK
text: Only four hits?

name: COOPER
text: Well I put four through the eyes and one through each nostril.We view the target sheet and see two holes where the eyes and where the nostrils would be in the human form of the target sheet.

name: HAWK
text: Nice pattern.LUCY speaks over the intercom.

name: LUCY
text: Agent Cooper, I'm looking at the files from Dr. Lydecker's and, for instance, I have here in the 'A's an Arky who's a part poodle part rottweiler, who lives on Maple and belongs to Mr. Rumple. Then, for example, I have an Annette who's an otter, who lives with a family near Elk river.

name: COOPER
text: We wanted the name of birds.

name: LUCY
text: I know but the files are all organized alphabetically.

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: Lucy, go through the bird file.

name: LUCY
text: No no you don't understand. Their organized alphabetically in the names of the pets.COOPER realizes that finding the bird is going to take quite a while.

name: COOPER
text: We're going to need some more coffee.CUT TO:INT. DOUBLE R DINER - DAYAt the counter, NORMA picks up a dirty plate and silverware as TOAD, a large and usual customer, drops some change for a tip. A country music tune plays in the background.

name: NORMA
text: Thanks Toad. I'll be sure to get this into my retirement fund A-S-A-P.SHELLY enters the diner, lifts the counter-door, passes and drops it behind her with a slam.

name: NORMA
text: Shelly, your gonna scare the customers.SHELLY walks up to NORMA.

name: SHELLY
text: I've got one man two many in my life and I'm married to him. Sound familiar.

name: NORMA
text: Maybe you should have a little talk with Leo.

name: SHELLY
text: Leo doesn't talk, he hits. (fiddles with her ring) He was so great at first, you know. This flashy guy in his hot car. Then we get married and I find out all he was looking for was a maid he didn't have to pay. I feel so stupid.

name: NORMA
text: (hugs SHELLY) Look at us. Two men apiece and we don't know what to do with any of the four of them.

name: SHELLY
text: So how did Hank's hearing go?

name: NORMA
text: Their going to decide this afternoon.

name: SHELLY
text: Have you told him your divorcing him for Ed.

name: NORMA
text: When I saw him I ... he might not even get out this time around. I guess my plans are a little up in the air.

name: SHELLY
text: Yeah well. I have definitely got plans for Leo.CUT TO:INT. DOUBLE R DINER - DAYAt front door, we see JAMES HURLEY enter and walk over to the pay phone just to his left on the wall.CUT TO:INT. DOUBLE R DINER - DAY

name: NORMA
text: You know what we're going to do Shelly, tomorrow? You and I are going to have a day of beauty. A manicure, a facial, we're going to have our hair done. The works. We're going to be the knockouts of the Double R. And its my treat.

name: SHELLY
text: (smiles) Yeah.

name: NORMA
text: Yeah.CUT TO:INT. DOUBLE R DINER - DAYAt the pay phone inside the diner, JAMES is speaking to DONNA.

name: JAMES
text: Donna.

name: DONNA
text: (over the phone) Hi James.CUT TO:INT. HAYWARD HOUSE - DAYOn the phone in the living room, DONNA is speaking to JAMES. In the background, we can see DR. WILL HAYWARD in the kitchen, with an apron draped on his arm, holding a cookbook. He yells to DONNA from the kitchen.DR. HAYWARDDonna.

name: DONNA
text: (to JAMES) Hold on.DR. HAYWARDWho the heck ever heard of diet lasagna?

name: DONNA
text: Just a sec daddy. I'll be right in okay, its James.DR. HAYWARDOh.

name: DONNA
text: (to JAMES) Hi, we're having this church pot luck dinner here tonight.DR. HAYWARDWell tell him to get over here. I need help. SOS.

name: DONNA
text: Okay. (laughs)DR. HAYWARDMayday, mayday.

name: DONNA
text: (to JAMES) Would you like to come?CUT TO:INT. DOUBLE R DINER - DAY

name: JAMES
text: I don't think I'd be very good company.

name: DONNA
text: (over the phone) Well I ... I think we need to talk.A bell rings from the opening of the front door to the diner. JAMES turns his head to look at who has entered. He sees a dark haired woman walk to the counter of the diner.

name: DONNA
text: (over the phone) Uhm ... I found out some things. Audrey told me some stuff and Mrs. Palmer saw something.

name: JAMES
text: What?

name: DONNA
text: (over the phone) Well if you come over I could tell you.

name: JAMES
text: I'm going to get something to eat and then I'll be over in a little bit.

name: DONNA
text: (over the phone) Okay, bye.JAMES hangs up the phone and walks over to the woman. Its MADELEINE standing by the counter waiting for her food order to arrive. JAMES stands right to the side of her and stares at her. At first she doesn't notice but then turns to face him and says ...

name: MADELEINE
text: Hi. (removes her glasses)

name: JAMES
text: Who are you?

name: MADELEINE
text: My name's Madeleine Ferguson. Laura was my cousin.

name: JAMES
text: (introduces himself) James Hurley.

name: MADELEINE
text: Laura and I hadn't seen each other much ... recently. I live in Missoula. Did you know Laura well?

name: JAMES
text: I thought I did. (smiles)

name: SHELLY
text: Here you go I got your order ready.

name: MADELEINE
text: Thanks a lot.

name: SHELLY
text: Mm-hmm.MADELEINE picks up her food order and holds it in her arms as she speaks to JAMES.TUNE: LAURA PALMER'S THEME (ONE INSTRUMENT V1)

name: MADELEINE
text: I'm picking up food for my aunt and uncle. Aunt Sarah can't cook right now and uncle Leland's up half the night listening to old music and crying and stuff ... but if I was cooking for them they'd be doing even worse. (laughs)JAMES still stares at her.

name: MADELEINE
text: You think I look like Laura?

name: JAMES
text: Yes. (nods)

name: MADELEINE
text: We used to come visit Twin Peaks when I was a kid. It was great. We'd pretend we were sisters. I wish I'd known her better. It's so sad. Well, it was nice to meet you James Hurley.They shake hands.

name: JAMES
text: Nice to meet you too.TUNE ENDS: LAURA PALMER'S THEME (ONE INSTRUMENT V1)CUT TO:INT. DOUBLE R DINER - DAYOn the phone at the end of the counter near the kitchen, NORMA leans behind a large machine as she listens to the outcome of the parole hearing.

name: NORMA
text: Thanks for calling Mr. Moonie.She hangs up the phone, disappointed by the results. SHELLY, carrying two mugs and a plate with a half eaten pie, comes up to her.

name: SHELLY
text: Are you okay?

name: NORMA
text: Hank got his parole.TUNE: LOVE THEME FROM TWIN PEAKSShe looks down at the ground.

name: NORMA
text: He's coming home.TUNE ENDS: LOVE THEME FROM TWIN PEAKSCUT TO:INT. BENJAMIN HORNE'S OFFICE - DAYWe view a CLOSEUP on a chandelier made with deer antlers. We PAN and ZOOM OUT to see BENJAMIN, dressed in a jogging suit, having a workout on a motion cycle in front of the fireplace. As he pedals, he speaks to someone on a portable phone. As he speaks, AUDREY walks into the room.

name: BENJAMIN
text: What's that? No I ... I don't know what you get when you cross a Norwegian and a Swede. (reply) Oh, very good sir, very good. I can't tell you how excited we are about bringing Icelandic investment to the great Northwest. Would you put my brother back on please. Jerry, who the hell is that joker. Your sure that he's the boss. Just make sure they don't start taking eggnog into the pilot. Jerr, I got the jet gassed up and on the runway in Seattle. Usher these guys through customs, make your connections and save me some of whatever it is that their having. (hangs up) Yeah.He continues to pedal and just barely notices AUDREY at his side.

name: BENJAMIN
text: Oh Audrey. I didn't hear you come in. What is it this time?

name: AUDREY
text: Daddy are you ashamed of me?

name: BENJAMIN
text: Audrey your uh ... your my daughter.

name: AUDREY
text: I was thinking about what we were talking about the other night when you were so mad.

name: BENJAMIN
text: It isn't that I'm ashamed of you, Audrey. Its just that I'd wish I could depend on you more. Especially during a trying time like this.

name: AUDREY
text: Well that's what I wanted to talk to you about. Dad, I want to change my life. I've decided I want to help you with the family business. I mean, one of these days you'll need someone to take over and obviously it's not going to be Johnny.

name: BENJAMIN
text: (slight laugh) Oh Audrey, I wish that I could believe you.

name: AUDREY
text: Daddy please. I saw a friend of mine ... cut down like a flower that had just begun to bloom. Life can be so short. (exhales) There isn't all the time in the world. I see that now and I want to change my life.

name: BENJAMIN
text: How exactly?

name: AUDREY
text: Well I don't need to go to college. You can teach me the business and I'm willing to start at the absolute bottom.

name: BENJAMIN
text: Alright. We've got some guest arriving. You go up stairs and start making some beds.

name: AUDREY
text: You still don't believe me.

name: BENJAMIN
text: Alright, okay, (stops pedaling) okay, alright, (gets off the motion cycle) alright. (walks away from her towards his desk) Where would you start?

name: AUDREY
text: Well I think I should start at the department store. Cosmetics or something. Just part time at first till I graduate.

name: BENJAMIN
text: Your really serious aren't you?

name: AUDREY
text: You have to start to think about the future daddy. Just like I am.

name: BENJAMIN
text: The future?

name: AUDREY
text: Our family's future. Please let me be your daughter again.

name: BENJAMIN
text: Audrey.He turns and holds out his arms. AUDREY moves to him and gives him a hug.TUNE: LOVE THEME FROM TWIN PEAKSAs she hugs her father she sees a photograph of LAURA PALMER and herself, dressed in heavy winter clothing, on his desk. The telephone rings. They separate as BENJAMIN moves over to the phone to answers it.

name: BENJAMIN
text: Hello this is Benjamin Horne.The phone call requires privacy. He covers the mouth piece with his hands and says ...

name: BENJAMIN
text: I have to take this sweetheart.

name: AUDREY
text: Oh okay. Thanks daddy.Slowly she walks toward the door but before she exits she turns around to look at him. BENJAMIN peers at her to make sure she's leaves before he talks.

name: BENJAMIN
text: Thank you Audrey.AUDREY finally leaves. BENJAMIN returns to the phone.

name: BENJAMIN
text: Where've you been? (reply) Meet me down by the river in a half hour and be discreet.TUNE ENDS: LOVE THEME FROM TWIN PEAKSCUT TO:EXT. TWIN PEAKS SHERIFF'S DEPARTMENT - NIGHTWe view a CLOSEUP of the sign above the entrance to the building with the sound of crickets in the background.CUT TO:INT. TWIN PEAKS SHERIFF'S DEPARTMENT - NIGHTIn the conference room, DEPUTY ANDY, SHERIFF TRUMAN and AGENT COOPER sort out the files from the veterinarian clinic. All three have paper cups of coffee in front of them. SHERIFF TRUMAN appears exhausted, COOPER downs his coffee while ANDY works diligently.

name: ANDY
text: Here's a bird. Louis Armstrong, he's a parakeet.

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: Put it with the others.

name: LUCY
text: (over intercom) Agent Cooper I got Gordon Cole on the phone.SHERIFF TRUMAN stands up to stretch his back. COOPER presses a button on the intercom unit in front of him to handle the call.

name: COOPER
text: Cooper here.

name: GORDON
text: Coop, Albert is faxing you his reconstruction of the plastic object found in Laura Palmer's stomach. He's also determined the bites and marks on her shoulders are made by a parrot or a mynah bird. That's it, your up to date.COOPER hangs up by pressing the button on the intercom unit. DEPUTY HAWK walks up to him carrying the fax that just arrived.

name: HAWK
text: Take a look at this.He hands the fax to SHERIFF TRUMAN. We view the fax of the drawing of the fragment as part of a circular whole of some kind of object like a coin.

name: COOPER
text: Something with the letter 'J'.

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: Poker chip.SHERIFF TRUMAN looks at COOPER.

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: One-Eyed Jacks.

name: ANDY
text: Waldo!SHERIFF TRUMAN and COOPER turn to him. ANDY moves to them carrying the file.

name: ANDY
text: Harry, Agent Cooper its a mynah bird named Waldo. A mynah bird owned by Jacques Renault.COOPER grabs the file.

name: HAWK
text: I'll get his home address.

name: COOPER
text: Gentlemen, when two separate events occur simultaneously pertaining to the same object of inquiry (slams the file to the table) we must always pay strict attention. Fellas let's make a house call.CUT TO:TUNE: FRESHLY SQUEEZED (DARK VARIANT)   46KEXT. TENNIS COURTS - NIGHTFrom a distance we view two people playing tennis. We PAN to a CLOSEUP of AGENT COOPER'S face.CUT TO:EXT. APARTMENT BUILDING - NIGHTWe watch AGENT COOPER, SHERIFF TRUMAN and DEPUTY HAWK run toward the building from their cars. COOPER leads the way to the apartment complex, a two story structure lit by lights and surrounded by pine trees. When they reach the building they run up a stairway to the second level.CUT TO:EXT. JACQUES RENAULT'S APARTMENT - NIGHTAt the door to JACQUES apartment, COOPER has his gun drawn and pointed at the door as SHERIFF TRUMAN shouts.

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: Jacques, its Harry Truman! Open the door!CUT TO:INT. JACQUES RENAULT'S APARTMENT - NIGHTWe view a CLOSEUP of BOBBY'S face as he hears the cops outside and looks around trying to find a way out. He see a window, rushes to it, slam it open and crawls out.CUT TO:EXT. APARTMENT BUILDING - NIGHTBOBBY lands to the ground and runs off into the distance.CUT TO:EXT. JACQUES RENAULT'S APARTMENT - NIGHTSHERIFF TRUMAN kicks the door in. With their guns drawn they rush inside. HAWK runs to the open window.

name: HAWK
text: He's headed around the side.

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: Go get him.HAWK runs out of the room.CUT TO:EXT. APARTMENT BUILDING - NIGHTBehind the apartment building we view a police cruiser, with its lights and siren on, drive after the person who they believe is JACQUES.CUT TO:INT. JACQUES RENAULT'S APARTMENT - NIGHTCOOPER puts on a pair of latex gloves.

name: COOPER
text: Let's get forensics and seal this room Harry.COOPER spots a blue work shirt, planted there by BOBBY, sticking half way out of a drawer. SHERIFF TRUMAN'S portable police radio buzzes. He picks it up to listen.

name: HAWK
text: (over the radio) Harry.

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: Yeah Hawk.

name: HAWK
text: (over the radio) He got away from me. I lost him in the woods.COOPER picks up the shirt and looks it over.

name: COOPER
text: Harry.COOPER calls SHERIFF TRUMAN over to look at the bloody shirt he just found and shows him the collar.

name: COOPER
text: 'LJ'. Leo Johnson. Leo Johnson and Jacques Renault.

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: That's our connection.CUT TO:EXT. RIVER - NIGHTIn the moonlight, through some trees we watch a running river.CUT TO:EXT. WOODS NEAR RIVER - NIGHTWe view a PAN of the area and see LEO'S red corvette. LEO stands facing the river while smoking a cigarette. The music comes to a peak just before its ends as BENJAMIN appears and pats LEO on the shoulder, scaring him. LEO quickly turns around. BENJAMIN puts his hands up to show no aggression.TUNE ENDS: FRESHLY SQUEEZED (DARK VARIANT)   46K

name: BENJAMIN
text: Nice touch Leo, nice touch. Bright red sports car for a secret meeting, nice.

name: LEO
text: Don't like it. Get somebody else.

name: BENJAMIN
text: No no no, Hank said that you were gifted. I believed him but Leo ... your whole approach, its misguided. Major career opportunities staring you in the face and all you can think about is car wax and chicken feed drug transactions.

name: LEO
text: Hey I'm out ten thousand dollars. Maybe that's peanuts to you. Not to me.

name: BENJAMIN
text: Your in business with a couple a' glue sniffing squish heads, Leo.

name: LEO
text: Renault brothers, I broke up their act. This is Bernie.TUNE: SECRET MEETINGSLEO gestures with a nod to point out the corpse of BERNARD RENAULT wrapped in canvas and tied securely with rope. They both move over to the corpse.

name: LEO
text: Jacques back in Canada. We had a long talk, he's staying there. Jacques was the brains in the outfit. Bernie made bail this morning on possession.

name: BENJAMIN
text: (clears his throat) Do me know if uh ... the late Bernard gave you up?

name: LEO
text: I told him if he ever did I'd kill him.

name: BENJAMIN
text: Oh, did he? (reaches into the inside of his coat and pulls out a cigar)

name: LEO
text: Nah, he shouldn't have trusted me but like I said Bernie wasn't too bright.

name: BENJAMIN
text: Okay, one last chance Leo. Don't disappoint me.

name: LEO
text: The mill?

name: BENJAMIN
text: Keep it simple. (bites the end of the cigar) Insurance investigators should read 'arson'. Block letters about uh ... six feet high.

name: LEO
text: The deal as we discussed.BENJAMIN pulls an envelope from his pocket and hands it to LEO.

name: BENJAMIN
text: The rest on delivery.CUT TO:EXT. RIVER - NIGHTWe watch the river flow as we listen to ...

name: BENJAMIN
text: Three nights Leo, green light. Is that clear enough?CUT TO:EXT. WOODS - NIGHTDONNA and JAMES, holding a flashlight, are walking in the woods.

name: DONNA
text: But if Mrs. Palmer knows about the necklace ...They both kneel at the exact spot where they buried the half gold heart necklace.

name: JAMES
text: How? How could she know?JAMES lifts the rock he hid the necklace under and begins to dig for it using his hand.

name: DONNA
text: She said she saw it. She said she had a vision and she saw someone take it.He can't find the necklace.

name: JAMES
text: Donna.He digs a little deeper and also scatters dirt around trying to feel for it but there's nothing.

name: JAMES
text: Donna its not here.

name: DONNA
text: Somebody must of seen us. Somebody must have followed us here then.

name: JAMES
text: How? How could Mrs. Palmer know?

name: DONNA
text: Laura used to say that her mother was kinda of spooky. She used to see things. She'd have these dreams, Laura did too.A hoot from an owl spooks them and they look around trying to see where it came from. They look up and see ...CUT TO:EXT. OWL PERCHED IN TREE - NIGHTA large owl with yellow eyes perched in a tree above JAMES and DONNA peers down at them.CUT TO:TUNE ENDS: SECRET MEETINGSEXT. WOODS - NIGHTJAMES and DONNA both look at each other.

name: JAMES
text: Maybe we should tell somebody.

name: DONNA
text: You mean the police?TUNE: LAURA PALMER'S THEME

name: JAMES
text: Well if it was the killer then he knows we know ...

name: DONNA
text: James the police didn't love Laura. Nobody loved her but us.

name: JAMES
text: I keep thinking I'm going to see her. I think that, you know, I'm going to catch a glimpse of her out of the corner of my eye. Sometimes its like I really do see her.

name: DONNA
text: James listen. We're going to find out who killed her. This is about us. We have to do this for us not just for her.Still kneeling, they bend toward each other and kiss.

name: DONNA
text: James I want to be with you.From a view above them we see them kiss again.CUT TO:EXT. BLUE PINE LODGE - NIGHTWe view the front of the lodge.CUT TO:INT. BLUE PINE LODGE - NIGHTWe view the mounted head of a white haired mountain goat hanging on the wall. Below it are its hooves being used to hold up a rifle. We PAN to a phone that rings and JOSIE, wearing a black silk robe, answers it. Behind her in the hallway we see PETE enter the lodge and walk past her holding a fishing pole and the mail.

name: JOSIE
text: Hello.

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: (over the phone) Josie its me.

name: JOSIE
text: Hi.

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: (over the phone) We just got a break in the Palmer case. I can't get away.

name: JOSIE
text: I miss you. I need to talk to you.

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: (over the phone) I want to talk to you too but ...CUT TO:INT. JACQUES RENAULT'S APARTMENT - NIGHTSHERIFF TRUMAN speaks to JOSIE over the phone.

name: SHERIFF TRUMAN
text: ... Josie were you at the Timber Falls Motel this afternoon?CUT TO:INT. BLUE PINE LODGE - NIGHT

name: JOSIE
text: I ... have to go. Call me tomorrow.CUT TO:INT. JACQUES RENAULT - NIGHT

name: JOSIE
text: (over the phone) Goodbye. (hangs up)SHERIFF TRUMAN hangs up the phone disappointed by her response.TUNE ENDS: LAURA PALMER'S THEME    CUT TO:INT. BLUE PINE LODGE - NIGHTPETE sits on a stool at the kitchen counter sorting the mail. JOSIE walks up to him.

name: PETE
text: Blow the whistle Josie. Its quitting time.

name: JOSIE
text: How did the shift go Pete?

name: PETE
text: Oh, cut some wood, made some lumber. I'm so tired I ...She incorrectly finishes his sentence.

name: JOSIE
text: Could eat a horse. (PETE laughs) I make you a turkey sandwich.JOSIE walks around the counter and enters the kitchen.

name: PETE
text: Oh that's fantastic Josie. Uhm, is Catherine asleep?

name: JOSIE
text: Yeah.

name: PETE
text: Good then give me some mayo with that. Josie, uhm ...how do you feel about fish?

name: JOSIE
text: To eat?

name: PETE
text: No, to catch. See the Fishing Association ... their annual duals coming up and I'm defending champion and this year their adding a mixed doubles division and I thought ... well if-if you were interested uh ... what the heck. Would you like to partner up with me?She walks over to PETE carrying a plate with his turkey sandwich.

name: JOSIE
text: Wow Pete. I don't know the first step about fishing.

name: PETE
text: Oh Josie, there's enough fishing in me for the both of us. Well what do you think?

name: JOSIE
text: Sure Pete. Let's give it the run of the money. (smile)

name: PETE
text: (very happy) Josie your my kinda' gal. Here (hands her the mail, picks up his sandwich). I'm going to hit the hay.

name: JOSIE
text: Sweet dreams Pete.

name: PETE
text: Sweet dreams Josie.PETE walks off. JOSIE goes through the mail.TUNE: LAURA PALMER'S THEME    She pauses as she picks one letter out of the rest, slowly opens it and pulls out a black and white sketch of a double three domino. HANK'S domino. She walks out of the kitchen and towards the library.CUT TO:INT. BLUE PINE LODGE - DAYIn the library, the telephone rings just as JOSIE walks besides a huge stuffed bear set in a ferocious stance. She answers the phone.

name: JOSIE
text: Hello.

name: HANK
text: (over the phone) Did you get my message?

name: JOSIE
text: Yes.CUT TO:INT. STATE PRISON - NIGHTWe view HANK stick the double three domino into his mouth and suck on it as he pulls it out. Into the phone he says ...

name: HANK
text: Catch you later.CUT TO:INT. BLUE PINE LODGE - DAYJOSIE hangs up the phone and caresses herself in fear.TUNE ENDS: LAURA PALMER'S THEME    FADE OUT:CLOSE:FADE IN:TUNE: LAURA PALMER'S THEME    We view LAURA PALMER'S homecoming picture as the end credits roll.TUNE ENDS: LAURA PALMER'S THEME    FADE TO BLACK:

name: LOG LADY
text: I play my part on my stage. I tell what I can to form the perfect answer. But that answer cannot come before all are ready to hear. So I tell what I can to form the perfect answer. Sometimes my anger at the fire is evident. Sometimes it is not anger, really. It may appear as such, but could it be a clue? The fire I speak of is not a kind fire.FADE OUT:INTRO:FADE IN:TUNE: TWIN PEAKS THEME    CREDITS run with the scenes of a bird in a tree, the mill machinery at work, the road into town with the welcome sign, the hotel by the falls and the river.TUNE ENDS: TWIN PEAKS THEME    FADE OUT:FADE IN:SONG: ICELANDERS I   14KEXT. HALF-MOON - NIGHTWe view a CLOSEUP of a tree branch of pine needles and then FOCUS on the background of the moon.CUT TO:INT. DALE COOPER'S HOTEL ROOM - NIGHTIn the dark, we hear men singing a song in a foreign language very loudly. FBI SPECIAL AGENT DALE COOPER is roused from his sleep, turns on his light by the bed, checks the time on his wristwatch and grabs his mini tape recorder. Still in bed he turns it on and says ...

name: COOPER
text: Diane, it is 4:28 am, I have just been woken up by the most god awful racket which you can probably hear over the sound of my voice. (pauses to record the loud singing) Can you hear that? Up until this moment, I've experienced nothing at the Great Northern Hotel but the most pleasant, courteous service imaginable. However, it just goes to prove a point that once a traveler leaves his home he loses almost 100 of his ability to control his environment. Diane I was wondering if you could overnight express to me two pairs of those Ear Pillow silicone ear plugs which I used on my last trip to New York. Naturally I didn't bring them with me on this trip because I didn't feel it would be necessary. However.COOPER holds the tape recorder up to record the loud song the men are singing. Then he shuts it off.SONG ENDS: ICELANDERS I   14KCUT TO:SONG: ICELANDERS II   21KINT. THE TIMBER ROOM - DAYAnother loud song being sung by the same group of men permeates the building as COOPER, who appears annoyed, walks into the dining area carrying a coffee cup. A waitress, TRUDY, carrying a pot of coffee, walks up to him before he takes a seat at a table. As he sits she asks ...

name: TRUDY
text: Coffee?

name: COOPER
text: Please.She fills the cup he brought with him.

name: COOPER
text: What's with the choir practice?

name: TRUDY
text: Business junket from Iceland. Got in about three this morning.

name: COOPER
text: (drinks his coffee) Ahh. Their on my floor.SONG ENDS: ICELANDERS II   21KThe group of men stop singing and cheer.

name: TRUDY
text: Lucky you.TUNE: FRESHLY SQUEEZED (0:26 - 3:48)AUDREY HORNE enters the dining area and slowly makes her way to COOPER.

name: COOPER
text: It'll take them a day or two to reset their biological clocks.He holds his cup out for her to refill it which she does.

name: TRUDY
text: Hope the hearing holds out.

name: COOPER
text: (as he takes another drink) Uhmm.TRUDY walks away just as AUDREY arrives at the table. TRUDY smiles as she walks away and sees AUDREY talk to COOPER.

name: AUDREY
text: How are you?

name: COOPER
text: (sip of coffee) Ahh. Well Audrey, to be perfectly honest, I'm tired and a little on edge.

name: AUDREY
text: Oh.AUDREY takes a seat opposite COOPER at the table.

name: AUDREY
text: I found a job.

name: COOPER
text: Good for you.

name: AUDREY
text: And I thought maybe now I could help you with your case. Guess we're goi ...COOPER raises his hand to interrupt her and stands up.

name: COOPER
text: Audrey you'll have to excuse me this morning. I'm running late. I only have time for coffee.

name: AUDREY
text: (stands up) Well maybe I could go with you.

name: COOPER
text: Wednesdays were traditionally a school day when I was your age.

name: AUDREY
text: (walks up to him, smiles and flirtingly says) I can't believe you were ever my age.

name: COOPER
text: (flirtingly) I've got the pictures to prove it. How old are you?

name: AUDREY
text: Eighteen.

name: COOPER
text: Well, see you later Audrey.

name: AUDREY
text: See you later. (he walks off) Bye.TUNE ENDS: FRESHLY SQUEEZED (0:26 - 3:48)We watch COOPER walk off but before he exits the room we see JERRY HORNE and MR. EINAR THORSON, leader of the Icelander group, enter the room. MR. THORSON, carrying a mug of beer, appears to be drunk as he leans on JERRY'S shoulder. JERRY is carrying some baggage.

name: JERRY
text: I'll see you later. (attempts to repeat in their language) How do you say that?MR. THORSON tells him how to say it in their language. He then pats JERRY on the back and walks off. JERRY yells to him and the rest of group in the other room.

name: JERRY
text: My brother ... my brother will love you guys!CUT TO:INT. BENJAMIN HORNE'S OFFICE - DAYWe FOCUS on a wood carved name of 'BEN', on top of the desk, and PAN to BENJAMIN HORNE as he lights a cigar while sitting at his desk. Behind BEN we see a poster board of the plans for the Ghostwood development project. JERRY bursts into his office and tells him something in the Icelandic language before he says ...

name: JERRY
text: Brother Ben, I bring you greetings from the fertile treeless tundra of Iceland.JERRY walks in and up to BEN'S desk. He puts his large bag on BENJAMIN'S desk.

name: BENJAMIN
text: We have had complaints from nearly every guest in the hotel.BENJAMIN picks up JERRY'S bag and tosses it to the floor.

name: BENJAMIN
text: What are they on, nitrous oxide.

name: JERRY
